if then else syntax

Sub FixDate() 

 myDate = #2/13/95# 

 If myDate < Now Then myDate = Now 

End Sub





if then else syntax

Sub AlertUser(value as Long) 

 If value = 0 Then 

   AlertLabel.ForeColor = vbRed 

   AlertLabel.Font.Bold = True 

   AlertLabel.Font.Italic = True 

 Else 

   AlertLabel.Forecolor = vbBlack 

   AlertLabel.Font.Bold = False 

   AlertLabel.Font.Italic = False 

 End If 

End Sub





if then elself elseif else syntax

Function Bonus(performance, salary) 

   If performance = 1 Then 

     Bonus = salary * 0.1 

   ElseIf performance = 2 Then 

     Bonus = salary * 0.09 

   ElseIf performance = 3 Then 

     Bonus = salary * 0.07 

   Else 

     Bonus = 0 

   End If 

End Function





selec case syntax Î≥ÄÏàòÍ∞Ä 3Í∞ú Ïù¥ÏÉÅÏù¥Î©¥ Ïù¥ Íµ¨Î¨∏ÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÏù¥ Ïö©Ïù¥

Function Bonus(performance, salary) 

  Select Case performance 

    Case 1 

      Bonus = salary * 0.1 

    Case 2, 3 

      Bonus = salary * 0.09 

    Case 4 To 6 

      Bonus = salary * 0.07 

    Case Is > 8 

      Bonus = 100 

    Case Else 

      Bonus = 0 

  End Select 

End Function 





‚ÄãWhileÍ≥º Ï°∞Ìï©Ïù¥Îêú Do‚Ä¶ Loop Î¨∏

Sub ChkFirstWhile() 

    counter = 0 

    myNum = 20 

    Do While myNum > 10 

        myNum = myNum - 1 

        counter = counter + 1 

    Loop 

    MsgBox "The loop made " & counter & " repetitions." 

End Sub 

 

Sub ChkLastWhile() 

    counter = 0 

    myNum = 9 

    Do 

        myNum = myNum - 1 

        counter = counter + 1 

    Loop While myNum > 10 

    MsgBox "The loop made " & counter & " repetitions." 

End Sub



UntilÍ≥º Ï°∞Ìï©Ïù¥Îêú Do‚Ä¶ Loop Î¨∏

Sub ChkFirstUntil() 

    counter = 0 

    myNum = 20 

    Do Until myNum = 10 

        myNum = myNum - 1 

        counter = counter + 1 

    Loop 

    MsgBox "The loop made " & counter & " repetitions." 

End Sub 

 

Sub ChkLastUntil() 

    counter = 0 

    myNum = 1 

    Do 

        myNum = myNum + 1 

        counter = counter + 1 

    Loop Until myNum = 10 

    MsgBox "The loop made " & counter & " repetitions." 

End Sub







Exit Do...Loop Î¨∏

Sub ExitExample() 

    counter = 0 

    myNum = 9 

    Do Until myNum = 10 

        myNum = myNum - 1 

        counter = counter + 1 

        If myNum < 10 Then Exit Do 

    Loop 

    MsgBox "The loop made " & counter & " repetitions." 

End Sub









For ‚Ä¶ Next Î¨∏

Sub Beeps() 

    For x = 1 To 50 

        Beep 

    Next x 

End Sub



Sub TwosTotal() 

    For j = 2 To 10 Step 2 

        total = total + j 

    Next j 

    MsgBox "The total is " & total 

End Sub



Sub NewTotal() 

    For myNum = 16 To 2 Step -2 

        total = total + myNum 

    Next myNum 

    MsgBox "The total is " & total 

End Sub









For ‚Ä¶ each next syndax









export images from excell file xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx







Sub PhotoPaste()



    Dim F_dlg As FileDialog

    Dim P_Shape As Shape

    Dim MyChart As Chart

    Dim NewWS As Worksheet    

    Dim i As Integer

    Dim F_Path, F_Name As String

    

    'FileDialogÎ°ú Ìè¥ÎçîÎ™Ö ÏßÄÏ†ïÌïòÍ∏∞

    Set F_dlg = Application.FileDialog(msoFileDialogFolderPicker)

    F_dlg.Title = "Ï†ÄÏû•Ìï† Ìè¥ÎçîÎ•º ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî"

    F_dlg.Show

    F_Path = F_dlg.SelectedItems(1)

    

    'Í∞ÅÍ∞ÅÏùò Í∑∏Î¶ºÏùÑ ÏàúÌôòÌïòÎ©¥ÏÑú

    For Each P_Shape In ActiveSheet.Shapes

    

        'Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄÏùò ÌååÏùºÎ™ÖÏù¥ Îê† ÎëêÎ≤àÏß∏ Ïó¥Ïùò Í∞íÏùÑ Í∞ÄÏ†∏Ïò§Í∏∞

        For i = 2 To 10000

            If Range("B" & i).Top > P_Shape.Top Then

                F_Name = Range("B" & i - 1).Value

                Exit For

            End If

        Next i

    

        'Ïù¥ÎØ∏ÏßÄÎ•º Ï†ÄÏû•ÌïòÍ∏∞ ( ÏõåÌÅ¨ÏãúÌä∏ ÏÉùÏÑ± ‚Üí Chart ÏÉùÏÑ± ‚Üí 

        ' ChartÏóê Í∑∏Î¶º Î∂ôÏù¥Í≥†, Ï†ÄÏû• ‚Üí ÏõåÌÅ¨ÏãúÌä∏ ÏÇ≠Ï†ú)

        Set NewWS = ActiveWorkbook.Sheets.Add

        

        With NewWS.Shapes.AddChart2

        

            .Height = P_Shape.Height

            .Width = P_Shape.Width

        

        End With

    

        P_Shape.Copy

        

        Set MyChart = NewWS.Shapes.Item(1).Chart

        MyChart.ChartArea.Select

        MyChart.Paste

        

        MyChart.Export F_Path & "\" & F_Name & ".PNG", "PNG"

        

        Application.DisplayAlerts = False

        NewWS.Delete

        Application.DisplayAlerts = True

    

    Next P_Shape

    

End Sub

! - Exclamation Point (ÏóëÏä§ÌÅ¥Îü¨Î©îÏù¥ÏÖò Ìè¨Ïù∏Ìä∏) 

" - Quotation Mark (ÏøºÌÖåÏù¥ÏÖò ÎßàÌÅ¨) 

# - Crosshatch (ÌÅ¨Î°úÏä§Ìï¥Ïπò), Sharp(ÏÉµ), Pound Sign(ÌååÏö¥Îìú ÏÇ¨Ïù∏) 

$ - Dollar Sign (Îã¨Îü¨ÏÇ¨Ïù∏) 

% - Percent Sign (ÌçºÏÑºÌä∏ÏÇ¨Ïù∏) 

@ - At Sign (Ïï≥ ÏÇ¨Ïù∏, ÌòπÏùÄ Ïï≥), Commercial At(Ïª§Î®∏ÏÖú Ïï≥) 

& - Ampersand (Ïï∞ÌçºÏÉåÎìú) 

' - Apostrophe (Ïñ¥ÌååÏä§Ìä∏Î°úÌîº) 

* - Asterisk (Ïï†Ïä§ÌÑ∞Î¶¨Ïä§ÌÅ¨) 

- - Hyphen (ÌïòÏù¥Ìîà), Dash (ÎåÄÏãú) 

. - Period (ÌîºÎ¶¨Ïñ¥Îìú), Full Stop (ÌíÄÏä§ÌÉë) 

/ - Slash (Ïä¨ÎûòÏãú), Virgule (Î≤ÑÍ∑§) 

Ôºº - Back Slash (Î∞±Ïä¨ÎûòÏãú) 

\ - Back slash  (Î∞±Ïä¨ÎûòÏãú )  <-- ÏûòÎ™ªÎêú Ï†ïÎ≥¥Îùº ÌïòÏó¨ ÏàòÏ†ïÌïòÏòÄÏäµÎãàÎã§.

: - Colon (ÏΩúÎ°†) 

; - Semicolon (ÏÑ∏ÎØ∏ÏΩúÎ°†) 

^ - Circumflex (ÏÑúÏª¥ÌîåÎ†âÏä§), Caret (Ï∫êÎüø) 

` - Grave (Í∑∏Î†àÏù¥Î∏å) 

{ - Left Brace (Î†àÌîÑÌä∏ Î∏åÎ†àÏù¥Ïä§) 

} - Right Brace (ÎùºÏù¥Ìä∏ Î∏åÎ†àÏù¥Ïä§) 

[ - Left Bracket (Î†àÌîÑÌä∏ Î∏åÎûòÌÇ∑) 

] - Right Bracket (ÎùºÏù¥Ìä∏ Î∏åÎûòÌÇ∑) 

( - Left Parenthesis (Î†àÌîÑÌä∏ ÌçºÎ†åÏî®ÏãúÏä§) 

) - Right Parenthesis (ÎùºÏù¥Ìä∏ ÌçºÎ†åÏî®ÏãúÏä§) 

| - Vertical Bar (Î≤ÑÌã∞Ïª¨Î∞î) 

~ - Tilde (Ìã∏Îìú) 

= - Equal Sign (Ïù¥ÌÄÑÏÇ¨Ïù∏) 

+ - Plus Sign (ÌîåÎü¨Ïä§ÏÇ¨Ïù∏) 

- - Minus Sign (ÎßàÏù¥ÎÑàÏä§ÏÇ¨Ïù∏) 

_ - Underscore (Ïñ∏ÎçîÏä§ÏΩîÏñ¥), Underline (Ïñ∏ÎçîÎùºÏù∏) 

< - Less Than Sign (Î†àÏä§ÎåÑ ÏÇ¨Ïù∏), Left Angle Bracket(Î†àÌîÑÌä∏ ÏïµÍ∏ÄÎ∏åÎûòÌÇ∑) 

> - Greater Than Sign (Í∑∏Î†àÏù¥ÌÑ∞ÎåÑ ÏÇ¨Ïù∏), Right Angle Bracket (ÎùºÏù¥Ìä∏ ÏïµÍ∏ÄÎ∏åÎûòÌÇ∑)

daily my script writing rules ver - 2022 04 06 13 06

	keep effort ratio study:application=1:3

	keep cleancode

	rename system, class, method ...etc

	do not expain vaiable name by using annotation.

	abstract main concept.

	abstract main purpose.

	abstract main function.

	keep abstraction level high sometimes(explained ¿œπ›»≠∞° ¿ﬂ µ».)

	keep abstraction level low sometimes(explained in detail)

	write script for keeping performance and maintaining

	ƒ⁄µ˘¿Ã π∫¡ˆ ∏∏£¥¬ ªÁ∂˜¿Ã ¿–¥ı∂Ûµµ Ω±∞‘ √ﬂ∑–¿Ã µ«æÓæﬂ «—¥Ÿ.

software developing system with git in linux

	it is used for managing SW version with coorperation.

	this concept has 4 sections as working directory, staging area, local repository, remote repository



	define my working directory n enter

	select "git bash here" by clicking MRB.



	git init

	#replace git? repositary to current folder.

what went wrong?

what went good?

: «¡∑Œ±◊∑°∏”∑Œº≠ «—πﬂ¬¶ ¥Ÿ∞°º≠¥¬ ∞≈∂Û∞Ì πœ∞ÌΩÕ¥Ÿ.







øπø‹√≥∏Æ in script

#recommanded

def buy_foods_for_mom():

    go_to_butcher_shop()

    buy_pork()

    go_to_supermarket()

    buy_milk()





#recommanded more

def buy_foods_for_mom():

    go_to_butcher_shop()



    if not fork:

        return go_home()



    buy_pork()

    go_to_supermarket()

    if not milk:

        return go_home()

    buy_milk()



class ThereIsNoMeat(Exception):

    pass



#recommanded more more

class ThereIsNoMilk(Exception):

    pass





def buy_foods_for_mom():

    try:

        go_to_butcher_shop()

        item_inspection('fork', buthcer_shop)

        buy_pork()

        item_inspection('milk', buthcer_shop)

        go_to_supermarket()

        buy_milk()

    except ThereIsNoMeat as e:

        go_home()

    except ThereIsNoMilk as e:

        go_home()





def item_inspection(item, place):

    if item not in place:

        if item == 'fork':

            raise ThereIsNoMeat("∞Ì±‚∞° æ¯Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ")

        elif item == 'milk':

            raise ThereIsNoMilk("øÏ¿Ø∞° æ¯Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ")







refactoring step 1 : test script.

refactoring step 2 : divide a function into functions n join common functions into a function n test script again.

refactoring step 3 : remove temporal variable.(temporal variable is defined as be used to once in script n test cript again.











write codes as JTTR style

	what is JTTR style?

		JTTR is a abbreviated word, Just Try To Replace.

		this is for programming begginer.

		when i see program script somewhere, i thoght that "what is it?" "how it works?"

		i wanted to understand script n use it, so i got some basic programming books n studied, but i failed to understand script.

		now that i think about it, it was because of not trying to write script.

		i just learn grammer without practice. that was very large mistake.

		when i am 29 with not to practice programming hard, i should revise technical document as excel file.

		n when i revised document, i found repetitive pattern in excel work. so i started to googling 

		i thought 

		i realized









Language studing idea

	i thought it needs comprehensible input not only English language using but also computer programming







rem export ∆ƒ¿œ¿ßƒ° by using batch file

@ECHO OFF

SETLOCAL

set file=C:\Users\l72rugschiri\Desktop\fs.cfg

FOR %%i IN ("%file%") DO (

ECHO filedrive=%%~di

ECHO filepath=%%~pi

ECHO filename=%%~ni

ECHO fileextension=%%~xi

)



rem export ∆ƒ¿œ¿ßƒ° by using batch file

@ECHO OFF

SETLOCAL

set file=C:\Users\l72rugschiri\Desktop\fs.cfg

FOR %%i IN ("%file%") DO (

set filedrive=%%~di

set filepath=%%~pi

set filename=%%~ni

set fileextension=%%~xi

)

arduino wireless comunication



nRF24L01

	2.4GHz RF ≈ÎΩ≈

	æÁπÊ«‚ ≈ÎΩ≈

atmega328 programming

	≥ª¿Â function 

	≥ª¿Â≈¨∑°Ω∫

atmega328p programming

MCU¿« ∏µ®∫∞ ≥ª¿Â≈¨∑°Ω∫, ≥ª¿Â function  «• ∏∏µÈ±‚   

arduino ∫∏µÂ ∫∞ ≥ª¿Â≈¨∑°Ω∫, ≥ª¿Â function  «• ∏∏µÈ±‚







// arduino language grammer

// arduino language is based of standard C and C++

// this is anotation of arduino language





// #include

#define REDPIN 5

#define GREENPIN 6

#define BLUEPIN 3

#define FADESPEED 5     // π‡æ∆¡ˆ∞Ì æÓµŒøˆ¡ˆ¥¬ Speed ¡∂¿˝

 

void setup() {

  pinMode(REDPIN, OUTPUT);

  pinMode(GREENPIN, OUTPUT);

  pinMode(BLUEPIN, OUTPUT);

}

 

void loop() {

  int r, g, b;

 

  // ∆ƒ∂ıªˆø°º≠ ∫∏∂Ûªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (r = 0; r < 256; r++) { 

    analogWrite(REDPIN, r);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

  // ∫∏∂Ûªˆø°º≠ ª°∞£ªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (b = 255; b > 0; b--) { 

    analogWrite(BLUEPIN, b);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

  // ª°∞£ªˆø°º≠ ≥Î∂ıªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (g = 0; g < 256; g++) { 

    analogWrite(GREENPIN, g);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

  // ≥Î∂ıªˆø°º≠ ≥Ïªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (r = 255; r > 0; r--) { 

    analogWrite(REDPIN, r);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

  // ≥Ïªˆø°º≠ √ª∑œªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (b = 0; b < 256; b++) { 

    analogWrite(BLUEPIN, b);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

  // √ª∑œªˆø°º≠ ∆ƒ∂ıªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (g = 255; g > 0; g--) { 

    analogWrite(GREENPIN, g);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

}

daily my script writing rules ver - 2022 04 06 13 06

	keep effort ratio study:application=1:3

	keep cleancode

	rename system, class, method ...etc

	do not expain vaiable name by using annotation.

	abstract main concept.

	abstract main purpose.

	abstract main function.

	keep abstraction level high sometimes(explained ¿œπ›»≠∞° ¿ﬂ µ».)

	keep abstraction level low sometimes(explained in detail)

	write script for keeping performance and maintaining

	ƒ⁄µ˘¿Ã π∫¡ˆ ∏∏£¥¬ ªÁ∂˜¿Ã ¿–¥ı∂Ûµµ Ω±∞‘ √ﬂ∑–¿Ã µ«æÓæﬂ «—¥Ÿ.

ø©¡ÿææ∞° µÂ∑–∞˙ ø¯∞› πÊº€¿Â∫Òø° «¡∑Œ±◊∑•¿ª ∞¸∏Æ«“ ∂© ¡Ÿ∞ ªÁøÎ«œ¥¬ ∞Õ ∞∞æ“¥Ÿ.

software developing system with git in linux

	it is used for managing SW version with coorperation.

	this concept has 4 sections as working directory, staging area, local repository, remote repository



	define my working directory n enter

	select "git bash here" by clicking MRB.

	#replace git? repositary to current folder.

	git pull remote_repository local_repository		#bring remote_repository to local_repository

what went good?

: «¡∑Œ±◊∑°∏”∑Œº≠ «—πﬂ¬¶ ¥Ÿ∞°º≠¥¬ ∞≈∂Û∞Ì πœ∞ÌΩÕ¥Ÿ.







øπø‹√≥∏Æ in script

#recommanded

def buy_foods_for_mom():

    go_to_butcher_shop()

    buy_pork()

    go_to_supermarket()

    buy_milk()





#recommanded more

def buy_foods_for_mom():

    go_to_butcher_shop()



    if not fork:

        return go_home()



    buy_pork()

    go_to_supermarket()

    if not milk:

        return go_home()

    buy_milk()



class ThereIsNoMeat(Exception):

    pass



#recommanded more more

class ThereIsNoMilk(Exception):

    pass





def buy_foods_for_mom():

    try:

        go_to_butcher_shop()

        item_inspection('fork', buthcer_shop)

        buy_pork()

        item_inspection('milk', buthcer_shop)

        go_to_supermarket()

        buy_milk()

    except ThereIsNoMeat as e:

        go_home()

    except ThereIsNoMilk as e:

        go_home()





def item_inspection(item, place):

    if item not in place:

        if item == 'fork':

            raise ThereIsNoMeat("∞Ì±‚∞° æ¯Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ")

        elif item == 'milk':

            raise ThereIsNoMilk("øÏ¿Ø∞° æ¯Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ")







refactoring step 1 : test script.

refactoring step 2 : divide a function into functions n join common functions into a function n test script again.

refactoring step 3 : remove temporal variable.(temporal variable is defined as be used to once in script n test cript again.











write codes as JTTR style

	what is JTTR style?

		JTTR is a abbreviated word, Just Try To Replace.

		this is for programming begginer.

		when i see program script somewhere, i thoght that "what is it?" "how it works?"

		i wanted to understand script n use it, so i got some basic programming books n studied, but i failed to understand script.

		now that i think about it, it was because of not trying to write script.

		i just learn grammer without practice. that was very large mistake.

		when i am 29 with not to practice programming hard, i should revise technical document as excel file.

		n when i revised document, i found repetitive pattern in excel work. so i started to googling 

		i thought 

		i realized

ECHO filedrive=%%~di

ECHO filepath=%%~pi

ECHO filename=%%~ni

ECHO fileextension=%%~xi

)

atmega328 programming

	≥ª¿Â function 

	≥ª¿Â≈¨∑°Ω∫

atmega328p programming

MCU¿« ∏µ®∫∞ ≥ª¿Â≈¨∑°Ω∫, ≥ª¿Â function  «• ∏∏µÈ±‚   

arduino ∫∏µÂ ∫∞ ≥ª¿Â≈¨∑°Ω∫, ≥ª¿Â function  «• ∏∏µÈ±‚







// arduino language grammer

// arduino language is based of standard C and C++

// this is anotation of arduino language





// #include

#define REDPIN 5

#define GREENPIN 6

#define BLUEPIN 3

#define FADESPEED 5     // π‡æ∆¡ˆ∞Ì æÓµŒøˆ¡ˆ¥¬ Speed ¡∂¿˝

 

void setup() {

  pinMode(REDPIN, OUTPUT);

  pinMode(GREENPIN, OUTPUT);

  pinMode(BLUEPIN, OUTPUT);

}

 

void loop() {

  int r, g, b;

 

  // ∆ƒ∂ıªˆø°º≠ ∫∏∂Ûªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (r = 0; r < 256; r++) { 

    analogWrite(REDPIN, r);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

  // ∫∏∂Ûªˆø°º≠ ª°∞£ªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (b = 255; b > 0; b--) { 

    analogWrite(BLUEPIN, b);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

  // ª°∞£ªˆø°º≠ ≥Î∂ıªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (g = 0; g < 256; g++) { 

    analogWrite(GREENPIN, g);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

  // ≥Î∂ıªˆø°º≠ ≥Ïªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (r = 255; r > 0; r--) { 

    analogWrite(REDPIN, r);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

  // ≥Ïªˆø°º≠ √ª∑œªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (b = 0; b < 256; b++) { 

    analogWrite(BLUEPIN, b);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

  // √ª∑œªˆø°º≠ ∆ƒ∂ıªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (g = 255; g > 0; g--) { 

    analogWrite(GREENPIN, g);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

}

√‚√≥: https://deneb21.tistory.com/444 [Do It Yourself!]

daily my script writing rules ver - 2022 04 06 13 06

	keep effort ratio study:application=1:3

	keep cleancode

	rename system, class, method ...etc

	do not expain vaiable name by using annotation.

	abstract main concept.

	abstract main purpose.

	abstract main function.

	keep abstraction level high sometimes(explained ¿œπ›»≠∞° ¿ﬂ µ».)

	keep abstraction level low sometimes(explained in detail)

	write script for keeping performance and maintaining

	ƒ⁄µ˘¿Ã π∫¡ˆ ∏∏£¥¬ ªÁ∂˜¿Ã ¿–¥ı∂Ûµµ Ω±∞‘ √ﬂ∑–¿Ã µ«æÓæﬂ «—¥Ÿ.







∆€«√æ∆

what went wrong?

: ø¿¥√¿∫ ∆Ø∫∞»˜ ¿ﬂ∏¯«—∞« æ¯¥¬∞Õ ∞∞¥Ÿ.

what went good?

: «¡∑Œ±◊∑°∏”∑Œº≠ «—πﬂ¬¶ ¥Ÿ∞°º≠¥¬ ∞≈∂Û∞Ì πœ∞ÌΩÕ¥Ÿ.







øπø‹√≥∏Æ in script

#recommanded

def buy_foods_for_mom():

    go_to_butcher_shop()

    buy_pork()

    go_to_supermarket()

    buy_milk()





#recommanded more

def buy_foods_for_mom():

    go_to_butcher_shop()



    if not fork:

        return go_home()



    buy_pork()

    go_to_supermarket()

    if not milk:

        return go_home()

    buy_milk()



class ThereIsNoMeat(Exception):

    pass



#recommanded more more

class ThereIsNoMilk(Exception):

    pass





def buy_foods_for_mom():

    try:

        go_to_butcher_shop()

        item_inspection('fork', buthcer_shop)

        buy_pork()

        item_inspection('milk', buthcer_shop)

        go_to_supermarket()

        buy_milk()

    except ThereIsNoMeat as e:

        go_home()

    except ThereIsNoMilk as e:

        go_home()





def item_inspection(item, place):

    if item not in place:

        if item == 'fork':

            raise ThereIsNoMeat("∞Ì±‚∞° æ¯Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ")

        elif item == 'milk':

            raise ThereIsNoMilk("øÏ¿Ø∞° æ¯Ω¿¥œ¥Ÿ")







refactoring step 1 : test script.

refactoring step 2 : divide a function into functions n join common functions into a function n test script again.

refactoring step 3 : remove temporal variable.(temporal variable is defined as be used to once in script n test cript again.











write codes as JTTR style

	what is JTTR style?

		JTTR is a abbreviated word, Just Try To Replace.

		this is for programming begginer.

		when i see program script somewhere, i thoght that "what is it?" "how it works?"

		i wanted to understand script n use it, so i got some basic programming books n studied, but i failed to understand script.

		now that i think about it, it was because of not trying to write script.

		i just learn grammer without practice. that was very large mistake.

		when i am 29 with not to practice programming hard, i should revise technical document as excel file.

		n when i revised document, i found repetitive pattern in excel work. so i started to googling 

		i thought 

		i realized









Language studing idea

	i thought it needs comprehensible input not only English language using but also computer programming







rem export ∆ƒ¿œ¿ßƒ° by using batch file

@ECHO OFF

SETLOCAL

set file=C:\Users\l72rugschiri\Desktop\fs.cfg

FOR %%i IN ("%file%") DO (

ECHO filedrive=%%~di

ECHO filepath=%%~pi

ECHO filename=%%~ni

ECHO fileextension=%%~xi

)



rem export ∆ƒ¿œ¿ßƒ° by using batch file

@ECHO OFF

SETLOCAL

set file=C:\Users\l72rugschiri\Desktop\fs.cfg

FOR %%i IN ("%file%") DO (

set filedrive=%%~di

set filepath=%%~pi

set filename=%%~ni

set fileextension=%%~xi

)







rem

FOR /F "delims=." %%F IN ('DIR /B') DO ECHO %%F

2022 diary as a learner using english

// arduino language grammer

// arduino language is based of standard C and C++

// this is anotation of arduino language





// #include

#define REDPIN 5

#define GREENPIN 6

#define BLUEPIN 3

#define FADESPEED 5     // π‡æ∆¡ˆ∞Ì æÓµŒøˆ¡ˆ¥¬ Speed ¡∂¿˝

 

void setup() {

  pinMode(REDPIN, OUTPUT);

  pinMode(GREENPIN, OUTPUT);

  pinMode(BLUEPIN, OUTPUT);

}

 

void loop() {

  int r, g, b;

 

  // ∆ƒ∂ıªˆø°º≠ ∫∏∂Ûªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (r = 0; r < 256; r++) { 

    analogWrite(REDPIN, r);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

  // ∫∏∂Ûªˆø°º≠ ª°∞£ªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (b = 255; b > 0; b--) { 

    analogWrite(BLUEPIN, b);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

  // ª°∞£ªˆø°º≠ ≥Î∂ıªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (g = 0; g < 256; g++) { 

    analogWrite(GREENPIN, g);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

  // ≥Î∂ıªˆø°º≠ ≥Ïªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (r = 255; r > 0; r--) { 

    analogWrite(REDPIN, r);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

  // ≥Ïªˆø°º≠ √ª∑œªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (b = 0; b < 256; b++) { 

    analogWrite(BLUEPIN, b);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

  // √ª∑œªˆø°º≠ ∆ƒ∂ıªˆ¿∏∑Œ ∫Ø»≠

  for (g = 255; g > 0; g--) { 

    analogWrite(GREENPIN, g);

    delay(FADESPEED);

  } 

}

Arduino is more like an embedded development board

raspberry pi is more like an single board computer

Latte Panda is closer to the concept of adding an Arduino to a Raspberry Pi.
